1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-123456789abc.title: The Hobbit
1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-123456789abc.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-123456789abc.summary: Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit, is swept into an epic quest to reclaim the lost Dwarf Kingdom of Erebor from the fearsome dragon Smaug.

2b3c4d5e-6f7g-8h9i-0j1k-234567890def.author: George Orwell
2b3c4d5e-6f7g-8h9i-0j1k-234567890def.summary: A dystopian tale of a totalitarian society under constant surveillance, where independent thought is a crime.

3c4d5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-1k2l-345678901ghi.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
3c4d5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-1k2l-345678901ghi.author: J.K. Rowling
3c4d5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-1k2l-345678901ghi.summary: Harry discovers he is a wizard on his 11th birthday and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, where he uncovers secrets of his past.
